title: WTB - blue Chase for back run
author: garymc

posts.post_title: WTB - blue Chase for back run
posts.post_content: This is what I have so far. I want to start with the Piedmont & Sweet Caporal commons, but will not turn down any 2nd or 3rd tier cards if they come available

[quote name="garymc" post=1734224]This is what I have so far. I want to start with the Piedmont & Sweet Caporal commons, but will not turn down any 2nd or 3rd tier cards if they come available[/QUOTE]



Just started my own chase blue back run, too.  Good luck!


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk

I have an SGC 3 Old Mill available. email me if interested

I also have a PSA 3 Sweet Caporal with a cool stamp on the reverse

[quote name="lug-nut" post=1735035]I have an SGC 3 Old Mill available. email me if interested

I also have a PSA 3 Sweet Caporal with a cool stamp on the reverse[/QUOTE]



Can you advise on the stamp?


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
the stamp is a hand with pointing finger, star and what appears to be a roman numeral I
